1470313560525869059.full_text: In 2014, China's top legislature designated December 13 as the national memorial day for the victims of the #NanjingMassacre. Let's take a moment to pay tribute to the victims, and remember the history. https://t.co/SIkxCx5to1

1470316267471253507.full_text: Eleven victims of the #NanjingMassacre have passed away this year, reducing the total number of registered survivors to 61. Witnesses of the massacre are aging, but history should never be forgotten. https://t.co/NguA8jxsMX

1470315425049165826.full_text: A memorial ceremony was held at the memorial hall in Nanjing, Jiangsu province, to mourn the 300,000 victims of the #NanjingMassacre on Monday. 1470316375168397313.full_text: 南京大虐殺：1937年12月13日に日本が占領する前は、歴史的および文化的な南京市は喧騒があり、近代化され活気がありました。 6週間で30万人が虐殺され、日本の侵略者は街を「生き地獄」に変えました。 #NanjingMassacre

1470317571899465729.full_text: As time goes by, only dozens of registered survivors of the #NanjingMassacre are still alive. This year, 11 of them passed away. Leaving fewer voices to call for justice. Some of the last survivors recount the horrifying scenes. https://t.co/GMP0fIilID

1470313532655009792.full_text: #NeverForget Today is China's national memorial day for the victims of the #NanjingMassacre. The Nanjing Massacre took place when Japanese troops captured the city on Dec. 13, 1937. Over six weeks, they killed more than 300,000 Chinese civilians and unarmed soldiers. https://t.co/zidOAAoGVL

1470318361292664832.full_text:
The atrocity of Nanjing Massacre will never be forgotten. On December 13, 1937, the Japanese invaders began a 40-days' massacre in Nanjing, more than 300000 people were brutally slaughtered. 
Don't forget history, safeguard peace#Nanjing #NanjingMassacre https://t.co/9lwEwFn83z

1470321344373932033.full_text: A China realizou nesta segunta-feira a oitava cerimônia de Estado em memória das vítimas do #Massacre de #Nanjing. Apesar do frio do inverno, milhares de pessoas vestidas de preto foram à cerimônia com flores brancas na lapela para transmitir suas condolências. #NanjingMassacre https://t.co/TDbBXvxA7R

1470268948268855303.full_text: Before Japanese occupation on Dec 13th, 1937, the historical and cultural city of #Nanjing was hustle and bustle, vibrant in modernization.
